messages.title: THE CLOSEST RACE IN BRITAIN
messages.content: Last time Nick was only 79 votes ahead of the Conservative candidate. The result will decide if Tories and their billion-pound donors or Nick with his campaign for an independent voice, who's challenging the broken system, gets in.

messages.title: Honest. Fair. Hardworking.
messages.content: Isn't that what we want our MPs to be? Honest. The new Parliament needs a cadre of experienced MPs who have proved they cannot be corrupted. The investigation showed Nick to be one of the minority with a completely clean record.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: No details of specific policies are discernible in the image provided.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Last time Nick was only 79 votes ahead of the Conservative candidate. The result will decide if Tories and their billion-pound donors or Nick gets in. Need to stop the Tory candidate from winning.

issues.health: The consultant's waiting list was over 2.5 years under the Tories. Now the waiting time, under Labour, is 12 weeks.

leaflet.personalStatement: Nick stands for the best in Labour’s tradition - progressive, open-minded and community-orientated to give that stronger economy.

endorsements.endorsement: I used to vote Liberal Democrat, but in this close election we need to stop the Tory candidate from winning.
As a lifelong Nick Palmer Liberal Democrat, I am happy to be supporting Nick and the Labour Party in this election.
I usually vote Liberal Democrat but I appreciate Nick's independence of mind on the big issues to Nick's in this election as it's expected to be so close.

quotes.text: Nick's approachability, reliability and honesty has earned him an exceptional reputation during the last two demanding electoral periods.
Nick Palmer is a sane voice in a political world turned upside down.

images.caption: RE-ELECT Nick Palmer Putting the trust back in politics

leaflet.additionalNotes: Some endorsements from traditionally non-Labour voters show cross-party appeal.
